abstract: The drug maker has been asked to provide details of its payments to faculty members at Harvard Medical School.
snippet: The drug maker has been asked to provide details of its payments to faculty members at Harvard Medical School.
lead_paragraph: Senator Charles E. Grassley on Tuesday asked the drug maker Pfizer to provide details of its payments to at least 149 faculty members at Harvard Medical School.

headline.main: Senator Asks Pfizer About Harvard Payments
headline.print_headline: Senator Asks Pfizer To Detail Pay To Harvard
